about.name: Jean-Michel LE
about.content: I am Jean-Michel LE, web developer from Lyon, France. I have rich experience in web site design and building and customization, also I am good at WordPress.

description: Kick off your next, great Gatsby project with this default-starter-intl. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.
author: @wiziple
welcome: Welcome to your new Gatsby site.

notfound.description: en anglais mon pote, You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
